formElement.label: Configuration:
formElement.documentation: Provide the name of a saved SCM configuration. (Required)

formElement.label: Destination Directory:
formElement.documentation: Provide the path where the checked in files will be downloaded. (Required)

formElement.label: Module:
formElement.documentation: Provide the name of the CVS module to get. (Required)

formElement.label: Run Quietly:
formElement.documentation: If checked the command will be really quiet; the command will only generate output for serious problems. This option can alleviate some problems that come up when a large number of files are checked out, so if the log is too big and the procedure shows problems it is recommended to run the procedure with this option.
